channel.title: josschavezf on CDSB
channel.description: Recent content in josschavezf on CDSB

item.description: With bachelor formation as Engineer in Biotechnology by the National Polytechnic Institute from Mexico (IPN), I started my scientific career studying Plant Epigenetics in CINVESTAV, then I made a master in the Biotechnology Institute from the National Autonomous University of Mexico (UNAM) focus on Drosophila Epigenetics. During the master studies I began to take some basic R courses with statistics and plotting orientation that woke up my interest in bioinformatics and programming.
